heading: Atomic Habits
description: How big change is only for movies and the secret to Andrew Ng's success. Yes, I am obsessed with the man.

heading: Best Books of 2021
description: (1) Hail Marry, (2) Mastery, (3) The War of Art, (4) The Defining Decade, (5) Atomic Habits.

heading: Robot Teachers
description: Robot Teachers are great for niche purposes, but not to replace the complex functions human teachers can provide, yet.

heading: Avoiding a Climate Disaster
description: There are 2 magic numbers: 50 million and 0. This masterpiece is free to any college students.

heading: CRIPR Gene Editing
description: Yuval Harari describes how humans solve problems, but never stop there. Once we solve enough problems with gene editing, just like with AI, we will start merging with it and make it part of our daily lives.
